text: I kogda veruyushchiye im govoryat: "Zhertvuyte iz togo, chem nadelil vas Allakh!" - neveruyushchiye otvechayut veruyushchim: "Neuzheli my budem kormit' tekh, kogo Allakh mog by nakormit', yesli by On pozhelal? Eto zhe budet protiv zhelaniya Allakha, i vy, kotoryye prizyvayete k zhertve, yavno slepy i ne vidite istiny
